DOC.brief_summary: Today Endoscopic repair recurrent Tracheesophageal fistula ( TEF ) safe procedure . Using Trichlosiacetic acid 50 % ( TCA ) endoscopic aplication fistula report good result ( 4 case ) . There serious advers effect . The investigator want use also TCA 50 % endoscopic repair child recurrent TEF .
DOC.brief_title: Trichloroacetic Acid Endoscopic Tracho-esophageal Fistula Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Today Endoscopic repair recurrent Tracheesophageal fistula ( TEF ) safe procedure . Using Trichlosiacetic acid 50 % ( TCA ) endoscopic aplication fistula report good result ( 4 case ) . There serious advers effect . We want use also TCA 50 % endoscopic repair child recurrent TEF .

DOC.keyword: We treat child age 1 month 20 year recurrent TEF surgical failure
